title: Researchers train AI to diagnose heart failure in rural patients using low-tech electrocardiograms
description: Concerned about the ability of artificial intelligence models trained on data from urban demographics to make the right medical diagnoses for rural populations, West Virginia University computer scientists have developed several AI models that can identify signs of heart failure in patients from Appalachia.

title: Humans are being hired to make AI slop look less sloppy
description: In the age of automation, human workers are now being brought in to fix what artificial intelligence gets wrong.
content:
The same technology that was supposed to put graphic designer Lisa Carstens out of business is now keeping her busier than ever.

title: Ex-Yahoo manager murders mother, kills self after conversations with 'AI best-friend Bobby': Report - Trending News
description: ChatGPT is under the radar after allegedly influencing a paranoid former Yahoo manager to commit a dreadful crime and take his own life. As reported by the Wall Street Journal (WSJ), Stein-Erik Soelberg, a techie from the US’ Connecticut, killed his mother after conversations with ChatGPT, an artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot by OpenAI.

title: How is artificial intelligence affecting job searches?
description: AI has already become a disruptor in the labor market, as job postings declined over the past year by 6.7%, with entry-level positions especially hard-hit. But not all industries are affected by the push for AI.
